page.title: 18Scarhill Engineering Works.
page.content: Work was started in{1979}from the owner's home.In{1980}the present site was bought.The workshop was built with the help of friends.Inside there are 3 welders,boxes of bolts,rods,grinders for cutting stone and metal and drills up to 6kg. Some are battery operated. A tub with circulating paraffin liquid cleans engine parts.Once a year,oil is changed.Parts for machines can be made on a laze.The{trolley jack}can lift{10 {tonnes,}which is useful for tractors. {Pistons}cost{Â£60}for the aluminium head.They have 3 tractors which they hire to farmers.They usually work for farmers within a 10mile radius getting about 2 jobs daily.In times of water shortage the Hydraulic Ram at Upper Lutheredge Farm is ineffective.A diesel operated pump is being made to overcome this problem.There is no shortage of work for the{2}employees.
